nodes.bodyText:
As we discussed, can u pass extra headers in curl command while accessing the console as follows ...
-H "WL-Proxy-Client-IP: 120.1.1.0" -H "WL-Proxy-SSL: false"  and make sure that this header does not appear in  adminserver log.
To get this header info you need to add the following DebugFlag on server startup args
-Dweblogic.http.isWLProxyHeadersAccessible=true -Dweblogic.debug.DebugHttp=true -Dweblogic.StdoutDebugEnabled=true
